scripts.kill:docker: docker stop centreon-dev && docker rm centreon-dev
scripts.cypress:local: pnpm start:docker && cypress run --e2e --config-file cypress.dev.config.ts --browser=chrome && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:local:debug: pnpm start:docker && DEBUG=cypress:* cypress run --e2e --config-file cypress.dev.config.ts --browser=chrome 2> ./cypress/results/logs.txt && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:local:ui: pnpm start:docker && cypress open --e2e --config-file cypress.dev.config.ts --browser=chrome && pnpm kill:docker
